SELECT Id as id, Title as title, Poster as poster, [Views] as views, Description as description, Active as active FROM Video WHERE Id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Video (Id, Title, Poster, [Views], Description, Active) VALUES (#{id}, #{title}, #{poster}, #{views}, #{description}, #{active})
